reporter_caption.center: WILKINSON v. JOHNS-MANVILLE CORPORATION, 43 Wn. App. 1021 (1986)

caption.center: DOROTHY E. WILKINSON, Individually and as Personal Representative,
Appellant, v. JOHNS-MANVILLE CORPORATION, ET AL, Respondents.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 864597, Lloyd W. Bever, J., entered March 5, 1984.

opinion_text.unpublished: Reversed and remanded by unpublished opinion per Williams, J., concurred in by Swanson, J., and Revelle, J. Pro Tem.
